daily_summary.headline: Exciting Day in Space: Rocket Launches and Aurora Opportunities

top_events.title: Rocket Lab's Electron Launch
top_events.description: Launch of the first two satellites for Open Cosmos' LEO broadband constellation.
top_events.action: Watch live stream for best experience.

top_events.title: Blue Origin's New Shepard Crewed Flight
top_events.description: Suborbital flight with six private astronauts onboard.
top_events.action: Follow live updates and watch the landing.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: Potential G1 geomagnetic storm with aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check sky conditions if you're at high latitudes.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
